test.baseUrl: Run e2e tests against dev server running at given url. Auto starts dev server if absent.
test.capabilities: Specify browser capabilities to run (default: desktop)
test.config: Use your own WebdriverIO configuration; overrides plugin defaults (relative to <projectRoot>)
test.debug: Enable Node inspector and debugging tools
test.details:
All WebdriverIO CLI options are supported.
http://webdriver.io/guide/testrunner/gettingstarted.html
test.headless: Run e2e tests in headless mode without GUI (default capabilities only)
test.specs: Glob pattern determines specs to run (relative to <projectRoot>)
